title: Khloe Kardashian gets a pink diamond ring from ex Tristan Thompson in new KUWTK trailer
text:
Khloe Kardashian's world was rocked in February when her boyfriend Tristan Thompson was exposed as having cheated on her once more.

So her surprise was obvious as her ex gifted her a pink diamond ring in footage revealed in the new Keeping Up With The Kardashians trailer.

She tells her friends in one scene: 'Look what Tristan gave me last night, a pink diamond.'

Look what I got! The new Keeping Up With The Kardashians trailer sees Khloe receive a ring featuring a pink diamond from her former boyfriend Tristan Thompson

Still good pals: Kourtney's ex Scott Disick tells her 'Well that's fully like an engagement ring'

Good news? Astonished, Khloe happily shows off the ring to her friends

Scott Disick tells her: 'Well that's fully like an engagement ring.'

Khloe smiles as she insists: 'nope, no.'

Although Khloe has ended things with Tristan, the two remain in close contact and coparent their one-year-old daughter True.

In other, as yet unexplained, scenes we see Khloe collapsing to the ground as her mother grabs her arm.

Emotional, she gasps: 'You little piece of s**t'.

Kim's voice is also heard calling someone 'the most pathetic human being'.

Bad news: In on scene we see Khloe collapsing to the ground as her mother grabs her arm

Emotional: Kim's voice is heard calling someone 'the most pathetic human being'

As for Kendall Jenner, she tells her sisters: 'I think sometimes, there's a lot of judgement'

Light hearted: We see Khloe and Kourtney dancing in a mirror in one scene

Elsewhere in the two-minute trailer for Sunday's upcoming episode, we see Kris Jenner attempting to 'push the reset button', comparing her girls Kim, Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian and their Jenner half-sisters Kendall and Kylie to the cast of 2004 movie Mean Girls.

'I feel like the really funny side of you guys outweighed the mean side,' matriarch Kris tells her daughters. 'And I feel like it's gotten a little Mean Girls.'

And in blunt words to Kim, the most famous of the cast, Kris says: 'As much as I love you, you fight a lot dirtier than you used to fight.'

Kris Jenner compares Kardashian daughters to Mean Girls cast and tells Kim 'you fight dirty'

Not impressed: Kim and Kourtney Kardashian listen to Kris telling them a few home truths

Listening in, Khloe raises her eyebrows in shock at the straight talking.

We also see Khloe ask Kourtney in surprise, of the show that made them household names: 'You would be happy if the show ended?'

Replies Kourtney: 'Yeah, of course.'

We then hear Kourtney insist with venom: 'Kim can be the biggest f***ing evil person on the planet.'

Listen to mom: In a new trailer for an upcoming episode of the show, we see Kris inform Kim she 'fights dirty'

Fall out: The affection between the five sisters seems to have dimmed in recent years, as fame and fortune have transformed their lives
description: Her surprise was obvious as her ex gifted her a pink diamond ring in footage shown on the new Keeping Up With The Kardashians trailer.
